      • importDefaultDataToProduction

        @Deprecated
 @Deprecated(value="Please check documentation for loading zone data through staging table")
public static void importDefaultDataToProduction()
                                                                                                                                                   throws java.io.IOException
        Deprecated. This should only be used internally for guidewire testing. This bypasses all integrity checking. Please check documentation for loading zone data through staging table
        Imports the default zone data into the production tables. The production tables are first cleared of any existing data. This should only be used internally, the data must have been verified as being clean.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - on failure to load the zone data

      • importZoneData

        @Deprecated
 @Deprecated(value="This should only be used internally for guidewire testing because it bypasses all integrity checking. Please check documentation for loading zone data through staging table")
public static int importZoneData(Country country,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                java.lang.String zoneData,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                boolean isStaging,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                boolean clearStaging)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         throws SOAPException
        Deprecated. This should only be used internally for guidewire testing because it bypasses all integrity checking. Please check documentation for loading zone data through staging table
        Imports the zoneData string for the given country.
        Parameters:
        country - the country
        zoneData - the zone data
        isStaging - true indicates import is being done into the staging tables
        clearStaging - true indicates to clear the staging tables first before doing the import
        Returns:
        the number of rows imported.
        Throws:
        SOAPException - if the country does not have zone configuration or the data is poorly formatted

      • getLogger

        public static org.slf4j.Logger getLogger()
        Returns:
        the API logger.
